description: Akudaikaan`s aide. Ms. Shitataare calls him "Go-chan". His name comes from the word "gouyaa (means a bitter melon in Okinawa)" and also "Echigo-ya (a shop name)". Echigo-ya is thought a synonym for a dishonest merchant as a villain of jidaigeki in Japan. In episode 47, it is revealed that he was the one who created Akudaikaan. After killing him, he transforms into a gigantic monster but is eventually defeated by Pretty Cure`s Spiral Heart Splash Star in the final episode.
name: Gooyaan
